## Feature interface

A feature adds new behaviors to the `WebView` DOM and offers handlers on React Native's side.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Feature<O extends {}, E extends string, P> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [assemble](./react-native-webshell.feature.assemble.md) | (options?: O) =&gt; [AssembledFeature](./react-native-webshell.assembledfeature.md)<!-- -->&lt;O, E, P&gt; | Assemble the feature source from options. The feature source object can thereafter be passed to [makeWebshell()](./react-native-webshell.makewebshell.md) utility. |
|  [eventHandlerName](./react-native-webshell.feature.eventhandlername.md) | E | The name of the event handler. The convention is to name it <code>on</code> + PascalCase event name. |
|  [identifier](./react-native-webshell.feature.identifier.md) | string | A unique identifier of the feature. The convention is to use a reverse namespace domain ending with the event name. |
